name: nine-mens-morris
description: Nine Men's Morris game implementation + AI using min-max algorithm and alpha-beta pruning.

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm version patch  && cd dist && git add . && git commit -am 'Add files' && git push
scripts.deploy:minor: npm run build && npm version minor  && cd dist && git add . && git commit -am 'Add files' && git push
scripts.deploy:major: npm run build && npm version major  && cd dist && git add . && git commit -am 'Add files' && git push

author: github.com/grudus
